1588990.name: Tor Eternum Demo
1588990.description:
Explore the enigmatic Tor Eternum with up to 10 friends in this frenetic online co-op action RPG Demo. Customize your character as you level up, explore the halls of the tower, and overcome billions of different procedurally generated bosses.

Key Features


  • Up to 10 players in Online Multiplayer Co-op
  • 4 different classes available in this demo
  • Character building, upgrades, and unique gear
  • Maximum level 8 available in the demo
  • Randomized stage boss generation
  • Procedurally generated exploration
